languages.text: "Это настоящий хаос! Как люди могут так много и хаотично думать?!"

traits.locale_text: "Это настоящий хаос! Как люди могут так много и хаотично думать?!"

languages.text: "This is pure chaos! How can people think so much, and so haphazardly?"
languages.original_text: "Это настоящий хаос! Как люди могут так много и хаотично думать?!"

traits.locale_text: "This is pure chaos! How can people think so much and so haphazardly?"
"This is pure chaos! How can people think so much and so haphazardly?"
"This is pure chaos! How can people think so much, and so haphazardly?"
"This is pure chaos! How can people think so much, and so haphazardly?"
"This is pure chaos! How can people think so much, and so haphazardly?"

languages.text: 「これぞ真の混沌よ！どうすればそれほど多くの物事を行き当たりばったりに考えられるのかしら？」
languages.original_text: "This is pure chaos! How can people think so much, and so haphazardly?"

traits.locale_text: 「これぞ真の混沌よ！どうすればそれほど多くの物事を行き当たりばったりに考えられるのかしら？」

languages.text: “这简直是一团混沌！这群人怎么能想得这么多，又这么杂乱无章？”
languages.original_text: "This is pure chaos! How can people think so much, and so haphazardly?"

traits.locale_text: “这简直是一团混沌！这群人怎么能想得这么多，又这么杂乱无章？”

languages.text: «¡Esto es un caos! ¿Cómo puede la gente pensar tanto y de forma tan dispersa?».
languages.original_text: "This is pure chaos! How can people think so much, and so haphazardly?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Esto es un caos! ¿Cómo puede la gente pensar tanto y de forma tan dispersa?».

languages.text: « Quel chaos ! Comment est-ce qu'on peut réfléchir autant et pourtant ne pas avoir la moindre pensée ordonnée ? »
languages.original_text: "This is pure chaos! How can people think so much, and so haphazardly?"

traits.locale_text: « Quel chaos ! Comment est-ce qu'on peut réfléchir autant et pourtant ne pas avoir la moindre pensée ordonnée ? »

languages.text: "Das ist pures Chaos! Wie können Menschen nur so viele unsortierte Gedanken haben?"
languages.original_text: "This is pure chaos! How can people think so much, and so haphazardly?"

traits.locale_text: "Das ist pures Chaos! Wie können Menschen nur so viele unsortierte Gedanken haben?"

languages.text: "Ben böyle kaos görmedim! İnsanlar nasıl hiç durmadan, hem de kaygısızca düşünebiliyor?"
languages.original_text: "This is pure chaos! How can people think so much, and so haphazardly?"

traits.locale_text: "Burası tam bir kaos! İnsanlar nasıl hiç durmadan, hem de kaygısızca düşünebiliyor?"
